Name: MSPT System Design

Caption.String: The design point parameters determine the nominal ratings of each part of the power tower system. After specifying the design point parameters here, you can specify details of each component of the system on the Heliostat Field, Tower and Receiver, Thermal Storage, and Power Cycle input pages.

is_parallel_htr.Label: Enable electric heater to charge cold HTF

Callbacks: if ( v == 'dni_des' || v == 'sf_excess' ) m = 'solar field size at the design point';
v == 'design_eff' ) m = 'receiver thermal power at the design point';
msg = 'You changed the value of ' + v_info.label + ', which changes the ' + m + '. You may want to optimize the field to ensure that the field layout and geometry are appropriate for the new value.';
msg  = "Dispatch optimization is required when using the electric charger. "
"Please select dispatch optimization on the System Control page.";
